Event: i miss that place, but miss wegmans even more. whole foods != wegmans
Post:
"I missed that place, but I miss Wegmans even more. Whole Foods just doesn't compare to Wegmans."

This post attributes the failure of the event (not enjoying the new place) to a broader pattern of failure in the individual's life (missing Wegmans and feeling that Whole Foods is not as good). It implies that the individual is doomed to fail in all aspects of their life, including their ability to find a suitable replacement for Wegmans.
